scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-nginx
scripts.ecr-create-repos: npm run ecr-create-app && npm run ecr-create-nginx
scripts.ecr-create-app: cd ../app && aws ecr create-repository --profile $AWS_PROFILE --repository-name app --image-scanning-configuration scanOnPush=true --region ${AWS_REGION}
scripts.ecr-create-nginx: cd ../nginx-ecs-simple && aws ecr create-repository --profile ${AWS_PROFILE} --repository-name nginx-ecs-simple --image-scanning-configuration scanOnPush=true --region ${AWS_REGION}
scripts.ecr-tag-repos: npm run ecr-tag-app && npm run ecr-tag-nginx
scripts.ecr-push-repos: npm run ecr-push-app && npm run ecr-push-nginx
